CSP.default: default-src 'self' https://*.mur-lang.org; script-src 'self' 'unsafe-eval' 'unsafe-inline' 'report-sample' https://*.mur-lang.org https://ajax.cloudflare.com/ https://static.cloudflareinsights.com/; style-src 'self' 'unsafe-inline'; connect-src 'self' https://*.mur-lang.org https://static.cloudflareinsights.com/; object-src 'none';

AccountsCSP.default: default-src 'self' https://*.mur-lang.org; script-src 'self' 'unsafe-eval' 'unsafe-inline' 'report-sample' https://*.mur-lang.org https://ajax.cloudflare.com/ https://static.cloudflareinsights.com/; style-src 'self' 'unsafe-inline'; connect-src 'self' https://*.mur-lang.org https://static.cloudflareinsights.com/; object-src 'none';
